name: Towers Through Time
description:
Summary

You are a time traveling mechanic from the future who’s job is to go travel throughout time to fix towers and defend the monument from Time Wraith's attempting to destroy it.
The time wraiths have one purpose in their lives and that is to destroy this monument which will affect time and how it works forever. You must run to the towers and repair them, preventing the Wraiths from getting past.

Instructions:

Move the player around the play area.
Defend the Monument from the Time Wraiths.
Stand inside the repair circles to begin repairing the towers.
The Towers will display an icon of charging up a red circle. when the towers icon in green, it's repaired and ready to fire.

The towers will slowly degrade as they are damaged by the presence of the Time Wraiths. The towers will flash and the icon will dim to show the player that the tower is now inactive.

The Time Freeze feature can be used in later levels. Standing on it will freeze time temporarily. This will freeze the Wraiths for a short time making them a target for the towers, which are immune to the time freeze.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move the mechanic around the map.
